price: 33. Il dit : « Il n’y a qu’Allah qui puisse le produire, s’Il le veut. Et vous ne sauriez mettre au défi Sa puissance.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَا يَأۡتِيكُم بِهِ ٱللَّهُ إِن شَآءَ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā yatīkum bihi al-lahu in shāa wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
